attributes.action: address anagelsia supply and help professionals help patinets in pain control management
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Like most people, I want to see improvements in public services - and worry about media reports - one idea to improve pain control management, addressing complaints by war veterans is to supply entonox routinely on surgical wards - this is usually only used widely on labour wards - but I think, in my 12 experience, would improve wound dressings management. Health service senior managers would do well to look at designing checklists - I note, that pain killer aren't routinely being given, though this is good rpactice. (I am not really sure if your online petitins system works, but I hope my usggestions help - Dr Reid did ask the public for ideas ...)

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
